post.content:
Netflix has announced the first forged for The Witcher prequel sequence Blood Foundation.

Jodie Turner-Smith, who starred in Queen & Slim and Nightflyers, plays Éile, “a fierce warrior with the declare of a goddess”.

The six-section dwell action restricted sequence is a prequel memoir space 1200 years prior to Geralt and the events we’re familiar with from Polish author Andrzej Sapkowski’s books, CD Projekt’s video games and the Henry Cavill Netflix veil. It tells the memoir of the first Witcher prototype and the Conjunction of the Spheres.

The Conjunction of the Spheres became a cataclysmic occasion that resulted in monsters arriving from one more dimension. It sooner or later resulted in the human-packed world followers of The Witcher are familiar with.

The Conjunction of the Spheres will almost certainly be a book within the first Witcher sport. Right here’s what it says (thanks, Fandom):

“The cataclysm generally identified as the Conjunction of the Spheres took space one and a half of millennia within the past. A cosmic collision of several parallel universes, this catastrophe left a expert series of creatures now now not native to our actuality trapped here. As an illustration, ghouls and graveirs, which lack their possess ecological niches are merely relics of the Conjunction.

“Clearly, these are all vile lies and despicable fabrications circulated by nonhumans, who will resort to essentially the most malicious slander to account for their claims.”
